description:
Komatsu arrives just in time to see Starjun murder Toriko... except the end of the battle proves to be just the beginning, as Toriko comes back thanks to striking a bargain with his "inner demon"! Now it`s Toriko`s turn to show what he learned from Aimaru... the Ultimate Routine!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: トリコ, 反撃! アルティメットルーティーン!!
